loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. Load options are: (a) four 4,000 lb bombs, (b) eight 2,000 lb bombs, (c) twelve 1,000 lb bombs, or (d) forty 500 lb bombs. Any bombs carried must be low-drag and contribute 1 load point per 1,000 lb.
Exceptionally, internal fuel also contributes 1 load point per 50 fuel points. A return mission will typically require leaving the target with at least 750 fuel points (15 load points).
notes: Flight Restrictions. UD, VD, ZC, and VC are forbidden. SC and SD may only use 1 VFP per turn. SD may only lose 1 altitude level per VFP.

Gun Turrets. Equipped with eleven .50 cal M2 guns, eight in four twin turrets and three in the tail mount. They can fire in any direction. They may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. The roll to hit is 2/1/1 and the AtA rating is 2. Gun attacks are modified only by the target size and have a -1 modifier when firing into the 60- arc. Ammunition is unlimited.
